dict.acceptation: 吸引；[物]引力；魅力；引人注意的东西，有趣的东西；

sent.orig: Develop the area begs a leap through attraction, owe develop the area seeks progress through attraction.
sent.trans: 发达地区通过招商引资求飞跃，欠发达地区通过招商引资求发展。

sent.orig: It is a film with Chaplin as the main attraction.
sent.trans: 这是一部以卓别林为主要吸引力的电影。

sent.orig: This force of attraction is known as the force of gravity.
sent.trans: 这种吸引力通常叫做重力。

sent.orig: This is Universal Studios' newest attraction and it really is mind-blowing.
sent.trans: 这是环球影城招徕游客的最新项目，的确是扣人心弦。

sent.orig: The attraction here are too many.
